item.title: MySQLTuner v1.3.0
item.description: It’s been three long years since the last MySQLTuner release but you’ll now find version 1.

item.description: It has finally arrived.

item.title: Calling all creative types: I need a slogan
item.description: As some of you may know, MySQLTuner is one of my favorite projects.

item.title: MySQLTuner now has a mailing list
item.description: Due to popular demand, I’ve created a mailing list for MySQLTuner.

item.title: MySQLTuner v0.8.5 is now available
item.description: To get the latest copy, head over to the download page!

item.title: MySQLTuner v0.8.0 is now available
item.description: Thanks to an e-mail from Joe Calderon, I’ve corrected a MySQLTuner bug where indexes were not being calculated properly when symbolic links are used.

item.title: MySQLTuner reaches 5,000 downloads!
item.description: I’ve just reviewed the stats for MySQLTuner, and it crossed the 5,000 download mark last week!

item.title: MySQLTuner Revision 29 is now available
item.description: A new version of MySQLTuner was released tonight to correct some bugs found within revision 26.

item.title: MySQLTuner Revision 26 is now available
item.description: As some subversion users may have noticed, revision 23 of MySQLTuner was released quietly on Sunday.

item.title: MySQLTuner is now a Debian package
item.description: I just received a note yesterday that MySQLTuner was added to Debian’s package list for the sid release.

item.title: MySQLTuner Revision 22 is now available
item.description: MySQLTuner revision 22 is available today.

item.title: MySQLTuner is now a Mandriva Linux package!
item.description: Thanks to Oden Eriksson at Mandriva, MySQLTuner is now packaged into an RPM for easier installations on Mandriva Linux.

item.title: MySQLTuner Revision 20 is available
item.description: I’ve updated MySQLTuner to revision 20 tonight, and it has the following improvements:

item.title: MySQLTuner Revision 19 is available
item.description: I’ve revamped a few of the recommendations in MySQLTuner, and revision 19 is now available tonight!
